text.div:
ReasonCode Logical Model

The justification, as a code. Reason is a string or CodeableConcept in DSTU2 but in later versions only a CodeableConcept, so we are not going to support a string.

name: ReasonCode
title: shr-core-ReasonCode
description:

Reason is a string or CodeableConcept in DSTU2 but in later versions only a CodeableConcept, so we are not going to support a string.
